Package gust.backend

Interface AssetConfiguration

  • @ConfigurationProperties("gust.assets")
public interface AssetConfiguration
    App configuration bindings for asset management and serving.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  AssetConfiguration.AssetCachingConfiguration
      Describes the structure of asset caching configuration.
      static interface  AssetConfiguration.AssetCompressionConfiguration
      Describes settings regarding compressed asset serving.
      static interface  AssetConfiguration.AssetVarianceConfiguration
      Describes settings that control the Vary header affixed to assets.
      static interface  AssetConfiguration.ContentDistributionConfiguration
      Describes the structure of CDN-related asset settings.
      static interface  AssetConfiguration.CrossOriginResourceConfiguration
      Describes settings regarding Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy headers for dynamic content.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static AssetConfiguration DEFAULTS
      Sensible defaults for asset configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> bump()
      Specifies a bump value to apply to all asset URLs.
      default AssetConfiguration.ContentDistributionConfiguration cdn()
      Specifies settings regarding CDN use.
      default AssetConfiguration.AssetCompressionConfiguration compression()
      Specifies settings for HTTP compression.
      default AssetConfiguration.CrossOriginResourceConfiguration crossOriginResources()
      Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy configuration for dynamic content.
      default java.lang.Boolean enableETags()
      Specifies whether to affix ETag values.
      default java.lang.Boolean enableLastModified()
      Specifies whether to affix Last-Modified values.
      default java.lang.Boolean enableNoSniff()
      Specifies whether to affix a X-Content-Type-Options policy for nosniff.
      default AssetConfiguration.AssetCachingConfiguration httpCaching()
      Specifies settings for HTTP caching.
      default AssetConfiguration.AssetVarianceConfiguration variance()
      Specifies settings for Vary headers.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULTS

        static final AssetConfiguration DEFAULTS
        Sensible defaults for asset configuration.

      • bump

        @Bindable("bump")
default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> bump()
        Specifies a bump value to apply to all asset URLs.

        @Bindable("etags")
default java.lang.Boolean enableETags()
        Specifies whether to affix ETag values.

        @Bindable("lastModified")
default java.lang.Boolean enableLastModified()
        Specifies whether to affix Last-Modified values.

      • enableNoSniff

        @Bindable("noSniff")
default java.lang.Boolean enableNoSniff()
        Specifies whether to affix a X-Content-Type-Options policy for nosniff.

default AssetConfiguration.ContentDistributionConfiguration cdn()
        Specifies settings regarding CDN use.
